Lyric:
[00:16.14]Well gonna write a little letter
[00:17.64]Gonna mail it to my local D.J.

[00:22.79]I want my jockey to play

[00:27.95]I gotta hear it again today
[00:30.22]
[00:31.84]You know my temperature's risin'
[00:33.46]And the jukebox's blowin' a fuse
[00:36.90]My hearts beatin' rhythm
[00:38.59]And my soul keeps singing the blues
[00:42.20]Roll over Beethoven
[00:43.68]And tell Tchaikovsky the news
[00:45.78]
[00:47.50]I got a rockin' pneumonia

[00:52.48]I got it off the writer

[01:01.47]
[01:02.29]Well if you fell you like it

[01:09.48]Just jump around and reel and rock it
[01:12.52]Roll it over

[01:16.75]

[01:35.17]I'm a givin' you the warnin'

[01:38.87]Hey little little
[01:39.95]Gonna play my fiddle
[01:41.10]Ain't got nothing to lose
[01:43.76]Roll over Beethoven
[01:45.06]And tell Tchaikovsky the news
[01:47.05]
[01:48.75]You know she winks like a glow worm

[01:58.82]Long as she's got a dime
[02:00.36]The music will never stop
